colorTheory.description: The color palette is a blend of dark text colors with a vibrant accent color for visual interest.
colorTheory.mood: The palette conveys a sense of professionalism and modernity with a touch of vibrancy.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures good readability and accessibility.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary text color (#000000) provides a strong base, complemented by the secondary text color (#333333). The accent color (#00A99D) adds a pop of contrast.
